attributes.action: Change the length of time to pass practical test after passing theory
attributes.additional_details:
So if you don't pass 1st time you are very likely to run out of time.  This is still from a back log in young people during covid and after trying to pass

I would like this 2 years on a theory test to pass,  changed to 3 years...
attributes.background: Pre covid you got 2 years,  that was when tests were available within weeks, there is about a 6 month wait and that's even if you can get a test,  on average it takes logging in at 6am every Monday morning and getting in a queue of 10k people to try get a test booked.  That can take months its self.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700314
